description:STRING: Fall asleep and enter the realm of the dreamweavers.
You arrive to a port city and find demons.
Take voyage in a submarine and explore the dreamweavers domain.
Go on a mission to retrive the dream catcher.
The dreamweaver has betrayed you.  Kill him.
You have killed the dreamweaver.  Now what?
Go back in time and resurrect the dreamweaver to be able to escape.
